name: Knit your own baby blanket kit
description:
A kit that includes everything you need to create your very own rainbow baby blanket out of the softest merino wool. Kit includes 8 balls of merino wool, a pair of high quality bamboo circular knitting needles and a set of instructions that take you from casting on to casting off! all presented in a lovely box!

I am happy to make bespoke kits if you want particular colours, let me know via email!

*note image of finished blanket is only for reference as the product you will get when you have finished your kit!

name: Handwoven lavender bags
description:
100% handwoven wool lavender bags, they include a fun hanger to put them in your wardrobe, on your door handle or Christmas tree with ease!

Approx 7x10cm in 100% pure new wool with a dried lavender centre

name: wool roving baby blanket
description:
Approx 70cm x 80cm and hand knitted by me, this blanket is the perfect size for a cot or pram and being 100% wool is super cosy and comfy to keep your little one toasty!

I've done a few different colourways so please leave me a comment to let me know which colours you would like for your own bespoke blanket from these options:

cornflower blue, burnt orange, petrol, cream, navy, medium grey, dusky pink, powder blue, red, magenta, purple, olive, yellow, brown and pale sage.
